talent.name: Train Reflexes
talent.flavourText: Improved agility and reaction time help you to avoid being hit.

talent.name: Train Willpower
talent.flavourText: Build willpower through discomfort and deprivation, strengthening your mental defenses.
Raise your shield for a few seconds, greatly increasing your chance to block attacks.

talent.name: Train Endurance
talent.flavourText: Grueling physical training makes you stronger and tougher.
An attack that enrages your enemy, making him more likely to attack you.

talent.name: Train Weapons
talent.flavourText: Learn how to best use different weapons, and get the most out of them.

talent.name: Train Strength
talent.flavourText: Increasing muscle mass and power puts more force behind your attacks
Knock your enemy out with a strong blow to the head.
Give your enemy a deep cut, causing blood loss and sustained damage

talent.name: Grammar
talent.flavourText: Memorize new facts, rules and relationships, giving you a larger pool of knowledge from which to draw.

talent.name: Arche
talent.flavourText: Water is the source of all matter, motion and change, and understanding this gives you new ways to quench fire.

talent.name: Epicureanism
talent.flavourText: Overcoming the fear of death helps you to embrace life.
Engage your enemy in dialectic argument, frustrating and annoying him.
All things flow like a river; nothing abides. This includes you as a target, and your enemies' attention.

talent.name: Study Widely
talent.flavourText: Consult a broad range of texts, to expand the general knowledge of magic on which you can draw.

talent.name: Study Deeply
talent.flavourText: Delve into magic you already know, making your spells more effective.

talent.name: Study the Zodiac
talent.flavourText: Each of us is born under a constellation. Studying their effects helps you to live in harmony.
Conjur fire and propel it towards an enemy.

talent.name: Study Poisons
talent.flavourText: Delving into the art of poisons may help you to avoid or resist them.

talent.name: Study Medicine
talent.flavourText: With more understanding of medicine comes a greater ability to mend the body.
Stab your enemy with a poisoned weapon, causing sustained damage.

talent.name: Study Classification
talent.flavourText: A habit of collecting and categorising nature helps you to find more when foraging and mining.
Apply leeches, to remove bad blood and associated disorders.

talent.name: Study Illusion
talent.flavourText: Avoid being hit, through mastery of deception and shadow.

talent.name: Transmute Skin
talent.flavourText: Alter your skin, making it thicker and more resilient.
Fade into darkness, making it harder for enemies to track you.

talent.name: Eternal Life
talent.flavourText: The quest for an elixir of life comes ever closer to fruition.

talent.name: Reverence
talent.flavourText: Sincere veneration makes the gods more generous when answering your prayers.

talent.name: Piety
talent.flavourText: The very air around you is cleansed by your purity and innocence.
The god of prophecy and truth grants increased knowledge to a friend.
Plead with the gods to heal the sick or save a life.

talent.name: Devotion to Dionysus
talent.flavourText: The god of wine will gladly protect you from water.

talent.name: Devotion to Hermes Trismegistus
talent.flavourText: Seek enlightenment from the divine master of writing and magic.
Invoke the protection of a noble spirit, to smite all who harm you.

talent.name: Devotion to Mithra
talent.flavourText: The lord of light dazzles your enemies and fades their efforts.
Ask for a personal blessing that reinvigorates you.

talent.name: Practice Breathing
talent.flavourText: Breathing exercises are good for the lungs and great for the heart.

talent.name: Practice Satire
talent.flavourText: Effective satire means finding and exploiting your enemy's weaknesses.
It's hard to stay angry when laughing.
Overcome your enemies with grief and regret.

talent.name: Practice Taking Criticism
talent.flavourText: Keeping your head in the face of critics is essential to surviving the stage.
